body.name: Ecover Delicate 750ml
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 49 mins
features: Ecover Delicate: A phosphate-free laundry detergent for all skin types.
Concentrated formula: Creates a rich lather to clean clothes.
Safe on delicate fabrics: Won't damage silk, wool, or other sensitive materials.
Eco-friendly: Leaves behind a fresh, plant-based scent.
Trusted brand: Ecover has been making environmentally conscious cleaning products for over 30 years.
body.description: Take good care of your fine fabrics, silks and woollens with Ecover’s Woolmark approved Delicate Laundry Liquid.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #43,318 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #294 in Liquid Laundry Detergent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light, pleasant fragrance will not overwhelm
reviews.reviewText: Bought for delicate washables; spouse is sensitive to fragrances and this one doesn't set off adverse reaction. Very happy with the results; cleans delicate fabrics well and doesn't leave much fragrance behind once dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Scent is not too strongexcellent for wool sweaters and play silks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great on washable merino
reviews.reviewText: Recently got on the “washable merino” bandwagon, and needed something better than Tide to wash all of my nice new garments.At first I used Dr. Bronzer, but didn’t really like the scent. I picked up on this product from an internet recommendation for woolen items and much prefer this to Bronners/etc.To be clear, wool always has its own “smell,” probably close to a wet dog out of the bath. This product helps a bit, and does leave some of my scratchier wool items a little softer and more bearable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cleans but weird smell
reviews.reviewText: I think this detergent does its job cleaning, but maybe because it's supposed to be light and gentle that the fragrance is not so appealing. I thrifted a lot of wool, silk and cashmere for the winter season, and I didn't want to not wash thrifted clothes. I ran the load twice in the washing machine in the delicate setting because the first round had a smell wafting before I even opened the washer. After the second time, it was much better. I think the detergent released/cleaned years old "dirt" on some of these hence the smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most amazing laundry detergent ever in the universe
reviews.reviewText: Yes, this stuff is pricey, but it's amazing. The scent and quality are absolutely worth it. During the pandemic, it was impossible to find this anywhere, so I'm just glad it's back in stock and I can get it again. Especially for delicates like bras and sheets, the scent is heavenly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My delicate and lycra based clothing has lasted for years due to this product
reviews.reviewText: This product washes delicate items such as leggings and undergarments cold wash hang dry, yet does not diminish the fabric. I love this product and have used it for years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They make good products
reviews.reviewText: I like everything they make.Works for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Really unpleasant strong smell that makes it unusable
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the Ecover delicates wash for over 10 years. The scent was strong but tolerable. I thought they had changed the packaging (bottle) only but it turns out they dramatically changed the scent. It is so overpowering and so unpleasant to me that I would get nauseous after entering the bathroom after I had hand-washed my swim suits. The old product worked well but why they don't offer a fragrance-free version is a mystery to me. I will need to switch brands after all these years. If you have any sensitivity to strong artificial scents, avoid this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for hand washing delicates in the sink and am very satisfied with it so far. It's gentle yet effective, and I love how it cleans without harsh chemicals, so there's no worry about damaging delicate fabrics such as silk and wool. The scent is light and pleasant, leaving clothes smelling fresh.A little goes a long way. If you need to hand wash delicate garments, I highly recommend giving this a try.

reviews.reviewTitle: My clothes feel and look great when I use this.
reviews.reviewText: I love Ecover laundry products. Great for my clothes and better for the environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Lasts for a really long time.
reviews.reviewText: I bought the Ecover Laundry Liquid to keep our knitwear nice and soft and to avoid any shrinkage where possible. This wash works very well, it has kept jumpers and cardigans soft and leaves a lovely scent afterwards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lush smell. Good stuff . Would recommend
